definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: Formulas are derived for the solution of the transient currents of dissipative low-pass T-type electric wave filters.
sentences.chinese: 此篇先推求收端加电阻时，低频滤波器瞬流之公式。

sentences.english: Based on one-dimensional Terzaghi consolidation theory, average percent consolidation is calculated.
sentences.chinese: 结合一维太沙基固结理论，推求某时刻的平均固结度。

sentences.english: Deducing spectral terms is very important for researching the atomic structure and spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 推求光谱项对于研究原子的结构和光谱十分重要。

sentences.english: Theoretically analyzing the method and formula which can deduce the moment function of piles by measured bending moment through model tests.
sentences.chinese: 理论分析由实测弯矩推求桩身弯矩函数的方法，公式。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the ascertaining methods and the study of the storm intensity formula of Harbin.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了哈尔滨市暴雨强度公式的推求及其研究。

definition: to study/to examine/to probe/to study the underlying principles
old variant of 晚近[wan3 jin4]
to study/to probe/to research and examine
to deduce/to infer/an implication/same as 推演
start and development/thread (of a story)/general outline/clue
the whole course of an event from beginning to end/ins and outs/the fundamental and the incidental
